name: 🧜‍♀️ Moja UI - FREE Top UI Kit & Design system
description:
Hello there. Thank you for considering Moja UI. 


Looking for a UI Kit that isnt ridiculously simple and not very advanced?

Moja UI is an easy to use and adequately robust UI library and design system of high quality to help you power up your designs.

It is free and will remain free forever irrespective of what it grows into. Dev kit coming.


You can support by 

- Please like this 💝 here on Figma 👆

- Consider buying me a coffee :)

Its deeply appreciated.


Features

- 8500+ Components & variants

- 1000+ function icons with size variants ready: 16px, 24px, 32px (adjusted down to stroke width)

- 258 flag icons with 2 size variants

- Popular brand logos (236) and icons (506)

- Responsive typography (adjust/reduce/expand to your taste)

- Slim & adequate set of color styles to get you going on your UI project fast.

- Autolayout ✔️


✔️ FREE Lifetime updates (More components and cool features coming)

✔️ Documentation

✔️ Sample/demo components to get you going.

✔️ Content on updated UX best practices for component usage in UI.

✔️ Easily expandable variant structure


Components

Accordions, Alert - Inline, Alert - Sticky, Avatar, Badge(Label/Lozenge), Buttons, Button group, Link, Checkbox, Radio, Chip(Pill/Tag), Date picker, Dropdown menu, Input text, Input group, Input dropdown/Dropdown, List (simple), List (Advanced, Popover, Progress - Bar, Progress - Circle, Slider, Tab, Textarea, Toggle, Tooltip.
